Summarize this article into 3 sentences.
This article outlines the key legal principles to consider when creating a contract. It explains the importance of detailing the scope and purpose of both parties’ obligations, as well as listing any warranties and liabilities of both parties.

This article emphasizes the essential legal principles to consider in contract creation, highlighting the necessity of clearly defining the scope and purpose of both parties' obligations. It underscores the importance of including detailed descriptions of any warranties and liabilities for both involved parties. By doing so, the article aims to ensure clarity and prevent potential disputes in contractual agreements.
